name: Archer
description: Has high attack speed.

name: Bombardier
description: Has a chance to stun the target. Chance of subsequent stuns is decreased.

name: Cold Mage
description: Lowers target's movement speed on every hit.

9.name: Deep Freeze
9.description: Every 15 attacks, the Cold Mage freezes monsters for 4s. This effect activates once.

9.name: Fierce Cold
9.description: Slows the target by an additional 5% on top of the max amount.

11.name: Heat Leak
11.description: When the Cold mage merges, a random unit on the opponent's field freezes for 6s. Duration increases with the merge rank. Does not work in Co-Op and Clan Tournament Attack.

11.name: Flash of Frost
11.description: When the Cold Mage merges, 3 monsters on the path are slowed by the max amount. The number of monsters increases based on the Cold Mage's merge rank.

13.name: Blizzard
13.description: Has a 7% chance on attack to affect the taret with a blizzard, slowing monsters in the area.

13.name: Cracking Ice
13.description: Frozen targets with health below 30% take 20% more damage.

15.name: Deadly Cold
15.description: Frozen targets die if their health drops below 5%.

name: Fire Mage
description: Deals damage in an area around the target.

name: Hunter
description: The first shot at a target deals increased damage. Damage also grows with merge rank.

9.name: Poaching
9.description: Moves to the next target every 15 shots.

9.name: Sudden Shot
9.description: Has 50% chance to also deal 150% more damage with the first shot.

11.name: Hunting Season
11.description: Killing a boss or mini boss with the Hunter's attack gives a trophy. When you have 6 trophies, 2 Hunters go up in merge rank, and your trophies reset to zero.

11.name: Large Prey
11.description: Killing a boss or mini boss with the Hunter's attack gives a trophy. Increasing that unit's damage by 15. The maximum number of trophies cannot exceed 60.

13.name: Buckshot
13.description: Hunters at merge rank 3 or higher deal 30% damage in a small radius around the target.

13.name: Keen Eye
13.description: Hunters at merge rank 3 or higher get an additional 12%  critical damage chance.

15.name: Wild Hunt
15.description: Has a 30% chance to increase the number of trophies. Killing a boss or mini boss summons a swift boar to your opponent's field. Killing an enemy with the Hunter also has a 8% chance to summon a boar. Does not work in Co-Op or Clan Tournament Attack.

name: Lightning Mage
description: Deals lightning damage to the first three targets (100%, 70% and 30% respectively).

name: Poisoner
description: Poisons enemies, dealing damage over time. Damage from poison increases with each merge rank.

name: Rogue
description: Damage per strike increases by a random number between 1 and your critical damage value.

name: Thrower
description: Attacks a random target.

name: Alchemist
description: Periodically creates a puddle of acid that deals damage to monsters. The trap's damage increases with each merge rank.

name: Banner
description: Increases attack speed for four neighboring units based on merge rank.

name: Magic Cauldron
description: Produces mana every several seconds. The amount of mana produced increases in proportion to the merging rank.

name: Chemist
description: Increases damage taken by the target. The damage buff grows with each merge rank.

name: Grindstone
description: Increases critical damage chance for four neighboring units based on merge rank.

name: Priestess
description: Gives mana when merged or killed.

name: Sentry
description: Gradually increases damage dealt in 10% increments. As the merging rank becomes higher the time required for the next damage gain decreases.

name: Sharpshooter
description: Deals additional damage to bosses and minibosses. During the boss waves, Crazy Shooting is triggered increasing damage and attack rate.

name: Zealot
description: Increases his damage according to the amount of unused mana.

name: Catapult
description: Hurls a projectile that stuns enemies in the area.

name: Crystalmancer
description: With each attack against the target, the damage dealt to it by every Crystalmancer increases. The damage increase is individual for each target.

name: Engineer
description: Damage increased for every Engineer connected to this one.

name: Gargoyle
description: The Gargoyle attacks enemies at odd merge ranges. At even merge ranks, it falls asleep giving adjacent Gargoyles an area attack. The Gargoyle is also invulnerable to negative effects at event merge ranks, and when it appears on the field, adjacent Gargoyles have a chance to be shielded from one negative effect.

name: Executioner
description: Finishes off a monster below a certain amount of health. Less effective against bosses.

name: Mime
description: Can be merged with any other unit of the same merging rank.

name: Plague Doctor
description: Infects enemies. After dying, they leave behind a cloud that damages anyone who passes through it. The trap's damage increases with each merge rank.

name: Ivy
description: Throws seeds that periodically deal damage. This damage increases with each noxious flower on a monster. When an enemy dies, its flower explodes, poisoning adjacent monsters and dealing damage based on the max number of noxious flowers on the monster.

name: Portal Keeper
description: Swaps positions with any unit of the same merge rank, then becomes temporarily inactive. Both units receive a temporary shield that dispels all negative effects.

name: Pyrotechnic
description: With an odd number, attack speed is reduced, he attacks a random target, and deals area damage. With an even number, damage is reduced, and he attacks the first target.

name: Reaper
description: Has a chance to instantly kill the target on hit. Does not work on bosses.

name: Portal Mage
description: Has a chance to teleport an enemy to the beginning of the map. Chance of next teleport is decreased.

name: Thunderer
description: Hits an extra target with chain lightning for each merge rank. The lightning dazes enemies for a certain period.

name: Vampire
description: Bites the target, making it periodically give you mana.

name: Wind Archer
description: Goes into hurricane mode every few seconds, significantly increasing own attack speed.

name: Bruiser
description: Has a chance to become enraged, receiving significant bonuses when 7 or more monsters are on the battlefield. Must reset before becoming enraged again. Is always enrage when fighting bosses. In PvE mode, does not require a certain number of monsters to become enraged.

name: Blade Dancer
description: Without any Dancers nearby, enters enhanced mode, gaining an attack speed bonus. Increases damage dealt for each Dancer on the battlefield.

name: Boreas
description: Periodically changes firing phase. In the first phase increases attack speed. In the second phase, increases attack speed and critical hit chance.

name: Corsair
description: The Corsair leaves explosive traps on the battlefield. Has a chance to through a nasty bomb, dealing a certain percentage of the target's current health in damage.

name: Cultist
description: With 1-3 adjacent Cultists, gets an attack against additional targets. With 4 adjacent Cultists, empowers himself and his neighbors while also getting area attack.

name: Demon Hunter
description: Attacks the first several targets in the amount equal to the merge rank. Demon Hunters with the highest merge rank deal increased damage.

name: Demonologist
description: Summons a monster to the opponent's side when merging. Killing the monster gives mana to the summoner. In Co-Op mode, summons monsters to both players' fields, killing the monster gives double the mana amount.

name: Dryad
description: Increases the merging rank of the unit it merges with.

name: Frost
description: Throws a blizzard at opponents every several seconds that slows them all at once. The slowing power increases with merge rank.

name: Harlequin
description: When merged, creates a copy of any unit with the same merge rank. The damage dealt by the copy is reduced.

name: Inquisitor
description: Increases damage against the target with each attack. When you have 1, 4, 7 or 10 Inquisitors, they activate an extra ability that increases attack speed and allows dealing splash damage.

name: Hex
description: Gives an instant kill chance to four neighboring units. The chance increases with a greater unit merge rank.

name: Knight Statue
description: Increases the attack speed of neighboring units. If an even number of Knight Statues is on the field, activates an ability that additionally increases attack speed and critical damage chance in proportion to merge rank.

name: Clock of Power
description: Lowers (in PvP) or increases (in PvE) the attack speed of the other player's units. After merging, significantly reduces (in PvP) or increases (in PvE) the attack speed of the other player's units for 8 seconds.

name: Meteor
description: When merged, drops a meteorite down on enemies. The explosion can deal critical damage. The damage from the explosion and critical chance increase in proportion to the user's merge rank. Deals double damage to bosses and mini bosses.

name: Minotaur
description: Periodically causes Earthquakes that slow down and damage monsters in the area. When merging, causes a Rockfall that additionally slows down all monsters and inflicts damage depending on their health loss.

name: Scrapper
description: Absorbs allied units to increase the merge rank of other units.

name: Stasis
description: Creates time control spheres that stop enemies in place.

name: Summoner
description: When merged, summons a random unit to a free tile. The unit's rank is random, from 1 to the Summoner's merge rank.

name: Tesla
description: Receives charges when units in adjacent tiles are merged or increase rank. Damage is increased with every charge. Receives a chain attack when maximum charge is reached.

name: Trapper
description: Periodically throws a net at a random point. The net slows down monsters and increases the damage they take.

name: Witch
description: When merging, the With curses and opponent's unit in PvP and enchants an ally's unit in Co-Op. The cursed unit heals monsters with its attacks, and the enchanted unit increases its damage.

name: Shaman
description: When merged, lowers the merging rank of a random enemy unit by one. In cooperative mode, however, it increases the merging rank of a random allied unit instead.

name: Robot
description: Gets new abilities, depending on the number of merges the unit has been part of. New abilities are unlocked at 1, 5, 10, 15 and 20 merges.
